Idea 4 - "EmpathyEcho": A platform that uses AI-powered algorithms to match users based on their emotional resonance, rather than just their interests or location. Users can connect with others who are going through similar experiences, fostering empathy and understanding. Confidence score: 0.9/1

Idea 5 - "RitualRally": A social media platform that focuses on building and connecting communities around shared rituals and practices. Users can connect with others who share their values and beliefs, and create meaningful connections through shared experiences. Confidence score: 0.8/1
